column1: South Park has become overrun with the homeless.  Nearly every square inch of public property is now riddled with homeless, shutting down roadways and making getting around impossible.  Many people are trapped throughout the town.
In the meantime, South Park citizens are being advised to stay indoors and protect their change.
What the? You can't be in here.
No I don't have any change. How did he get in here?
No, please. I don't have any change. Honest I don't. I don't have any-
Tom, I'm standing in a meadow just outside of town, where police have discovered the first victim of the serial copycat killer. Child wunderkind Eric Cartman is now arriving on the scene.
